Package src.recomanador.persistencia

Class ControladorPersistencia

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.recomanador.persistencia.ControladorPersistencia
  • public class ControladorPersistencia
extends java.lang.Object
    The class ControladorPersistencia implements the functionalities of writing and reading data from memory. It also manages the folder structure where the information will be stored.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ControladorPersistencia

        public ControladorPersistencia()
        Creates a new instance of the class ControladorPersistencia. It also finds the data folder, and if it doen't exist, it creates it.

    • Method Detail

      • getNomProjecte

        public java.lang.String getNomProjecte()
                                throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotFoundException
        It returns the name of the project that is being used. This name represents a folder inside /data, where the information will be held.
        Returns:
        The name of the folder is returned, or null in case there's no folder assigned to.
        Throws:
        src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotFoundException - Throws a an exception if the folder is missing.

      • llistatCarpetes

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> llistatCarpetes()
        Shows all the folders that are inside /data. These folders represents the projects that the user can choose.
        Returns:
        Returns all the folders that are inside the saved projects folder.

      • existeixenDadesPreprocesades

        public boolean existeixenDadesPreprocesades()
        Informs you if there are all the necessary files for loading ALL the preprocessed data.
        Returns:
        Returns true if all the files needed for the preprocessed data are in the folder. Otherwise it returns false;

      • existeixenTestos

        public boolean existeixenTestos()
        Informs you if there are all the necessary files for loading the test data.
        Returns:
        Returns true if all the files needed for testing the algorithm are in the folder. Otherwise it returns false;

      • escollirProjecte

        public void escollirProjecte​(java.lang.String s)
                      throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotFoundException
        Establishes the name of the project, which is the one that has the folder that contains the information that will be loaded, and it's where the information will be stored. It also loads the state of the algorithm if it existed, or it creates one with -1 as all values (except for the name, that will have "ERROR_NameNotValid").
        Parameters:
        s - Represents the name of the folder, which sholde be chosen among the list of existing folders.
        Throws:
        src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotFoundException - Throws an exception if the folder is incorrect.

      • sortirDelProjecte

        public void sortirDelProjecte()
        Establishes the project folder and the estat ArrayList as null to indicate that there's no project selected.

      • setKAlgorisme

        public void setKAlgorisme​(java.lang.String k)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets the value of the algorithm's K as the one specified. It also stores into estat.csv all the parameters from the array estat.
        Parameters:
        k - Indicates the number K that the algorithm had used.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws an exception if you are not in a valid folder.

      • setQAlgorisme

        public void setQAlgorisme​(java.lang.String q)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets the value of the algorithm's Q as the one specified. It also stores into estat.csv all the parameters from the array estat.
        Parameters:
        q - Indicates the number Q that the algorithm had used.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws an exception if you are not in a valid folder.

      • setAlgorismeSeleccionat

        public void setAlgorismeSeleccionat​(java.lang.String a)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets the value of the algorithm selected as the one specified. It also stores into estat.csv all the parameters from the array estat.
        Parameters:
        a - Indicates the number of the selected algorithm
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws an exception if you are not in a valid folder.

                        throws java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:
        nom - Indicates the name that the items used.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws an exception if you are not in a valid folder.

      • setPosicioID

        public void setPosicioID​(java.lang.String pos_id)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets the value of the id column position from the item's set as the one specified. It also stores into estat.csv all the parameters from the array estat.
        Parameters:
        pos_id - Indicates the column position that is used.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws an exception if you are not in a valid folder.

      • carregarArxiuCarpeta

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> carregarArxiuCarpeta​(java.lang.String s)
                                                                                 throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
        Reads a file specified from the folder "carpeta". The file must be a .csv file (or at least the content must have that structure), and needs to have the same number of columns for every row.
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of ArrayList of the values. Each ArrayList of ArrayList(line) contains an array of strings (columns).
        Throws:
        src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws an exception if the file is corrupted or is missing.

      • carregarRecomanacionsCarpeta

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> carregarRecomanacionsCarpeta()
                                                                                        throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
        Returns the recomendations and valorations read from memory
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of ArrayList of the values. Each ArrayList of ArrayList(line) contains an array of strings (columns). The first line corresponds to the header of the file, where each column is its identifier. The rest of the lines contain the values read.
        Throws:
        src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws a FolderNotValidException if the file is corrupted or is missing.

      • carregarItemsCarpeta

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> carregarItemsCarpeta()
                                                                                throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
        Returns the items read from memory
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of ArrayList of the values. Each ArrayList of ArrayList(line) contains an array of strings (columns). The first line corresponds to the header of the file, where each column is its identifier. The rest of the lines contain the values read.
        Throws:
        src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws a FolderNotValidException if the file is corrupted or is missing.

      • carregarPesosAtributs

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> carregarPesosAtributs()
                                                            throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
        Returns some information read from memory about the items: the weights of the attributes.
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of the values (represented as Strings).
        Throws:
        src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws a FolderNotValidException if the file is corrupted or is missing.

      • carregarFitxerExtern

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> carregarFitxerExtern​(java.lang.String s)
                                                                                throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FileNotValidException,
                                                                                       src.recomanador.excepcions.FileNotFoundException
        Returns a csv table read from memory
        Returns:
        Returns an array of arrays of the values. Each array of arrays(line) contains an array of strings (columns). The first line corresponds to the header of the file, where each column its identifier. The rest of the lines contain the values read.

        Throws:
        src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws a FileNotValidException if the file is corrupted.
        src.recomanador.excepcions.FileNotFoundException - Throws a FileNotFoundException if the file is missing.
        src.recomanador.excepcions.FileNotValidException

      • crearProjecte

        public void crearProjecte​(java.lang.String s)
                   throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
        Creates an empty folder to store all the files. It also sets the variable carpeta as the file pointing the new one.
        Parameters:
        s - It's the name that the folder will have. It can only contain letters, numbers, '.', '-' and '_'
        Throws:
        src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws a FileNotValidException if the file is corrupted.
